content.rendered:
Tax and Compliance Services

While you are planning to expand your business in new territory or willing to ensure business efficiency locally, maintaining compliance with the business laws becomes a significant task that demands a deep understanding of tax-related requirements and statutory compliances. Also, with the rapid change in tax and accounting laws, it becomes difficult for companies to stay aligned with the changes in laws and their application in their business’ compliance and tax filing procedure.

Tax and Compliance team at KiRi Accounting has deep domain knowledge and proven expertise to understand the increasing sophistication of tax laws. Our dedicated tax and compliance team can help you manage the tax risks and thoroughly support your business’ compliance needs. Being experts in the league, our team helps you improve risk, manage your economic capital, and foster cost reduction while adding value to your business.

What do we serve?

  • Preparation and Filing of 1099s
  • Preparation and Filing of W-2s
  • Preparation and Filing of Business Tax Returns – Form 1065, 1120, 1120S
  • Preparation and Filing of Individual Tax Returns – Form 1040
  • Preparation and Filing of Sales and Use Tax
  • Assisting clients by working with their CPA directly for audit/review/tax work
